env.$comment: This entity declare the environment variable what the application needs
env.name: TEST

file.$comment: This entity declare the config file to be injected from outside of container
file.name: test.txt

dependsOn.$comment: This entity declares other container. docradle waits until this item is available.

stdout.$comment: Setting for stdout. If the application uses zerolog (JSON log), Set structured true

stderr.$comment: Setting for stderr. If the application uses zerolog (JSON log), Set structured true
